full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GSER 'OD DAM PA MDO SDE DBANG PO'I RGYAL PO BKLAG PA'I CHO GA DGE LEGS SPEL BA'I NYI 'OD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(CES 'PHAGS PA GSER 'OD DAM PA MDO SDE'I DBANG PO RGYAL PO BKLAG PA'I CHOG DGE LEGS SPEL BA'I NYI MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RIGS RUS PHUN SUM TSOGS SHING DAD STOBS DANG LDAN PA THU SHE YE GUNG TA LA'I CHING BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG CES BYA BAS, DAM PA RNAMS KYI LUNG BSTAN LA BRTEN NAS GSER 'OD MANG DU 'DON DGOS PA'I TSE 'DUL GYI MAndAL KHA BTAGS DANG BCAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BKA' STZAL BA DANG DU RLABS TE, DAM PA RNAMS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS LEN PA'I BTZUN GZUGS ^YE SHES DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB KYIS RANG LO NYER DGU'I THOG DO NI LUGS DANG MTHUN PAR SBYAR NAS, PHYIS BRTZOM BYANG BOD DE RDZOGS PAR BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI DON GNYER DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN DANG NYE GNAS DGE SLONG CHOS BRTZON 'GRUS DPAL GYIS BRIS PA @018B 'DIS KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, SBYIN PA'I BDAG PO RNAMS KYIS GTZO BYAS RANG GZHAN SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA PHAN BDE RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: YE SHES DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB,
